channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KFDYNVXRM3B8CCWAXH15TE1P
item.description: @royal @grist #Grist #GetGrist is probably the most underrated low-code tool out there. Not #Airtable. Not #NoCoDB. Not #BaseRow. Etc.
item.content:encoded: @royal @grist #Grist #GetGrist is probably the most underrated low-code tool out there. Not #Airtable. Not #NoCoDB. Not #BaseRow. Etc.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KFDY08C0VMFK3E3SJF8SHQQ7
item.description: A lot of the dislike for #Seafile seems to focus on its opaque server-side directory structure. But that’s just application-managed storage—if you want proper backups, you back up the entire Seafile instance, same as Paperless-ngx with its numeric filenames. Personally, I just want a responsive file-sharing app that’s light on resources and easy to maintain. That’s not how I’d describe #Nextcloud.
item.content:encoded: A lot of the dislike for #Seafile seems to focus on its opaque server-side directory structure. But that’s just application-managed storage—if you want proper backups, you back up the entire Seafile instance, same as Paperless-ngx with its numeric filenames. Personally, I just want a responsive file-sharing app that’s light on resources and easy to maintain. That’s not how I’d describe #Nextcloud.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KFDVZ0XX028R5Y65RBRR7D3A
item.description: @oxidand and I also need custom fields and the ability to move documents across organizations. Been waiting for these #Papra features for a while now.
item.content:encoded: @oxidand and I also need custom fields and the ability to move documents across organizations. Been waiting for these #Papra features for a while now.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KFDVNNJWM50JHVT6TS6WKPCV
item.description: #Papra updated just an hour ago. Still no update on the feature I’ve been waiting for long now. Custom fields / properties. Always in backlog in their roadmap.
item.content:encoded: #Papra updated just an hour ago. Still no update on the feature I’ve been waiting for long now. Custom fields / properties. Always in backlog in their roadmap.

item.title: Windows 11 QEMU/KVM Installation Guide in Linux Including TPM and Secure Boot
item.description:
Windows 11 QEMU/KVM Installation Guide in Linux Including TPM and Secure Boot

This video is a tutorial on how to install Windows 11 in a QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine. This is based on Ubuntu 24.04 as the host Linux system, using a Linux compatible Laptop (Lenovo Thinkpad X1 Carbon 2025), with a TPM emulator and UEFI/Secure Boot emulator.
item.content:encoded:
Windows 11 QEMU/KVM Installation Guide in Linux Including TPM and Secure Boot

This video is a tutorial on how to install Windows 11 in a QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine. This is based on Ubuntu 24.04 as the host Linux system, using a Linux compatible Laptop (Lenovo Thinkpad X1 Carbon 2025), with a TPM emulator and UEFI/Secure Boot emulator.

item.title: JSON Crack
item.description:
JSON Crack

JSON Crack Editor is a tool for visualizing into graphs, analyzing, editing, formatting, querying, transforming and validating JSON, CSV, YAML, XML, and more.
item.content:encoded:
JSON Crack

JSON Crack Editor is a tool for visualizing into graphs, analyzing, editing, formatting, querying, transforming and validating JSON, CSV, YAML, XML, and more.

item.title: Anchor notes
item.description:
Anchor notes

Offline first, self hostable note taking application. Anchor focuses on speed, privacy, simplicity, and reliability across mobile and web. Notes are stored locally, editable offline, and synced across devices when online.
item.content:encoded:
Anchor notes

Offline first, self hostable note taking application. Anchor focuses on speed, privacy, simplicity, and reliability across mobile and web. Notes are stored locally, editable offline, and synced across devices when online.

item.title: Any Sync Bundle
item.description:
Any Sync Bundle

any-sync-bundle is a prepackaged, all-in-one self-hosted server for Anytype – a local-first, privacy-focused alternative to Notion. It merges all official Anytype sync modules into a single binary for simplified deployment. Think of it as “K3s for Any Sync”.
item.content:encoded:
Any Sync Bundle

any-sync-bundle is a prepackaged, all-in-one self-hosted server for Anytype – a local-first, privacy-focused alternative to Notion. It merges all official Anytype sync modules into a single binary for simplified deployment. Think of it as “K3s for Any Sync”.

item.title: Jotty
item.description:
Jotty

Lightweight but powerful alternative for managing your personal, file based, notes and checklists.
item.content:encoded:
Jotty

Lightweight but powerful alternative for managing your personal, file based, notes and checklists.

item.description:

item.content:encoded:
